Key Match Events: A brawl led to 6 ejections in the Miami Heat vs Houston Rockets game.
Tyler Herro and Terry Rozier were ejected from the game for the Heat.
Jalen Green, Amen Thompson, Ben Sullivan, and head coach Ime Udoka were ejected from the game for the Rockets.
Post-Match Reflections: The Miami Heat defeated the Houston Rockets 104-100.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game got out of hand, leading to a brawl and multiple ejections.
Others: The game was played early in the morning.
